query.statement: SELECT LAWFIRM_ID, LAWFIRM_NM, TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') AS REG_DT, REG_ID, REG_NM FROM TN_LAS_LAWFIRMMNG WHERE LAWFIRM_ID = :vo.auth_str_id
SELECT LWR_NO, LWR_NM, TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') AS REG_DT, REG_ID, REG_NM FROM TN_LAS_LAWYERMNG WHERE LWR_NO = :vo.auth_str_id
SELECT EVENT_NO, EVENT_NM, TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') AS REG_DT, REG_ID, REG_NM FROM TN_LAS_EVENTMNG WHERE EVENT_NO = :vo.auth_str_id
SELECT ACPT_NO, TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') AS REG_DT, REG_ID, REG_NM FROM TN_LAS_EVENT_ACCEPT WHERE ACPT_NO = :vo.auth_str_id
SELECT REMITCERT_NO, TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') AS REG_DT, REG_ID, REG_NM FROM TN_LAS_LAWFIRM_REMITCERT WHERE REMITCERT_NO = :vo.auth_str_id
